inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by radiologic evidence of varices, cirrhosis or portal hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least two HE episodes, one within the last year but not within the last month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written, informed consent (mini-mental status exam>25 at the time of consenting)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: TIPS, non-elective hospitalization or HE within last month
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and history of HE episodes. However, recent hospitalization for UGIB may be a concern.
